title: High Fertilizer Consumption Efficiency
description: In 2022, Estonia achieved a fertilizer consumption rate of 22,973.71% of its production, indicating efficient use of resources.

title: Low Carbon Emissions from Waste
description: Estonia reported minimal carbon dioxide emissions from waste, amounting to just 0.0001 Mt CO2e in 2023.

title: Efficient Industrial Water Use
description: In 2021, 92.29% of Estonia's total freshwater withdrawals were used by the industry, showcasing efficient water management.

title: Quality Public Services and Transparency
description: Estonia scored 84.97 in the B-READY Business Location Pillar 2 in 2024, reflecting high-quality public services and transparency.

title: Strong Governance in Utility Services
description: In 2024, Estonia achieved a score of 82.58 in the B-READY Utility Services Pillar 2, indicating robust governance and transparency.

title: Limited Patent Applications by Nonresidents
description: Estonia had only 1 patent application by nonresidents in 2021, suggesting potential for increased innovation attraction.

title: Minimal Net ODA to Least Developed Countries
description: In 2022, Estonia provided $490,000 in net ODA to the least developed countries, indicating room for increased international aid.

title: Low Control of Corruption Standard Error
description: With a standard error of 0.145 in 2023, Estonia demonstrates consistent control of corruption, enhancing governance reliability.

title: High Quality of Public Services
description: Estonia scored 73.31 in the B-READY Pillar 2 for Public Services in 2024, reflecting strong public service quality.
